text: Aechmea tayoensis is a species of plant in the family Bromeliaceae. It is endemic to Morona-Santiago Province in Ecuador.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesJørgensen, P. M. & S. León-Yánez. (eds.) 1999. Monographs in systematic botany from the Missouri Botanical Garden 75: i–viii, 1–1181 Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests.Gilmartin, Amy Jean 1981. A new species of Aechmea (Bromeliaceae) from Ecuador. Selbyana 5(3–4): 309. ==References== tayoensis Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Endangered plants Category:Plants described in 1981 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Aechmea tayoensis
